page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: There are no schools of any description in this block. There have been schools in both East and West Torrington in the past, but nowadays the few children that live there go elsewhere to school. Children are collected by school buses, and taken to Legsby County Primary School, if they are between five and eleven, or to the De Aston School if they are over eleven. De Aston School is now a comprehensive school, catering for all abilities. It is in Market Rasen, which is some six miles north of the Torringtons.
